meanings.definition: Making a short, sharp sound, as of glasses being tapped together.
meanings.sent1: The clinking glasses signaled the start of the celebration.
meanings.sent2: I heard the clinking noise coming from the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The clinking sound of the glasses made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The clinking of the glasses echoed through the room like tiny bells.
meanings.sent5: The clinking sound was so clear, it felt like music to my ears.

meanings.definition: A short, sharp sound, as of glasses being tapped together.
meanings.sent1: The clinking was heard across the room during the toast.
meanings.sent2: I love the clinking of glasses at a party.
meanings.sent3: The clinking of the glasses added a festive touch to the evening.
meanings.sent4: The clinking of the glasses was like a symphony of joy.
meanings.sent5: The clinking sound brought back memories of happy times.
